input: Execute a batch request to create a borrower party change request for loan UUID 98765432-10fe-dcba-3210-fedcba987654 with charge waiver, and propose a change for loan UUID 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequests HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"LoanContractUUID": "98765432-10fe-dcba-3210-fedcba987654", "ChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator": true}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /ProposedLoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequest HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"LoanContractUUID": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef"}

--request-separator--
